snippet: Republicans did their best to disparage Chuck Hagel at his hearing, but the full Senate should confirm him as defense secretary.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Senate confirmation hearing for Chuck Hagel, nominee for secretary of defense, saying senators did poor job of drawing substance out of moment; contends that despite Hagel's poor performance, it is clear that he is in the mainstream of American foreign policy, has the resume and experience, and Senate should confirm him.
lead_paragraph: Republicans did their best to disparage Chuck Hagel at his hearing, but the full Senate should confirm him as defense secretary.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
